author: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP
title: SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Notifies Shareholders of Rentrak Corporation of Commencement of an Investigation Concerning the Fairness of the Sale of the Company to comScore, Inc. -- RENT - Yahoo Finance
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--
The following statement is being issued by Levi & Korsinsky, LLP: 
To: All Persons or Entities who purchased Rentrak Corporation stock prior to September 29, 2015 . 
You are hereby notified that Levi & Korsinsky, LLP has commenced an investigation into the fairness of the sale of Rentrak Corporation ( RENT ) to comScore, Inc. ( SCOR ) for 1.15 shares of comScore, representing an approximate value of $49.63 per share based on the closing price of comScore on the business day prior to the merger announcement. To learn more about the investigation and your rights, go to : 
http://zlk.9nl.com/rentrak-rent 
or contact Joseph E. Levi, Esq. either via email at jlevi@zlk.com or by telephone at (212) 363-7500, toll-free: (877) 363-5972. There is no cost or obligation to you . 
Levi & Korsinsky is a national firm with offices in New York, New Jersey, Connecticut and Washington D.C. The firmâ€™s attorneys have extensive expertise in prosecuting securities litigation involving financial fraud, representing investors throughout the nation in securities lawsuits and have recovered hundreds of millions of dollars for aggrieved shareholders . For more information, please feel free to contact any of the attorneys listed below. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
